faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions below.

q1.question: Are these documents legally valid?
q1.answer: Yes. All documents are based on legal templates and clauses used across the U.S.

q2.question: Are documents state-specific?
q2.answer: Yes. The platform adapts documents to match your U.S. state requirements.

q3.question: Can I edit after generating a document?
q3.answer: Yes, you can make updates before downloading your final PDF.

q4.question: Do I need to talk to a lawyer?
q4.answer: For most everyday documents, no. If you need legal advice, we recommend speaking to an attorney.

q5.question: Is my data secure?
q5.answer: All documents are encrypted and only stored temporarily for your access.

q6.question: How much does it cost?
q6.answer: Documents start at just $5. We also offer bundles and unlimited access.
